title: Exiled: Reign Storm
description: Ari, daughter to the Lord and Lady of an elven city called Loomea, finds her life turned upside down when her jealous Uncle returns from exile with an army to lay siege to the city. In one harsh blow, he destroys everything and everyone she's ever loved, including Erik, the only man she's ever loved. With no way to defend herself, Ari is forced to flee from Loomea or face death herself. When Ari meets Lasura, an injured dragon in serious need of help, her life takes yet another unexpected turn. With Lasura's assistance, Ari sets out on the adventure of a lifetime to gather an army of her own. Can she do it in time to save the remaining elves trapped inside Loomea, though?
author: Laura Halbert
